# Crypto

> Standard library cryptography.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var crypto = require( '@stdlib/crypto' );
```

#### crypto

Standard library cryptography.

``` javascript
var c = crypto;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var crypto = require( '@stdlib/crypto' );

console.log( getKeys( crypto ) );
```
